title: Update promise reveal button to aesthetic pink and change label text

requirements.text: Update the additional promise reveal button at the end of the Promise Day greeting card to use an aesthetic pretty/dark pink color styling (including hover/active states) instead of the current coral styling, while keeping the button readable and consistent with the pageâ€™s romantic theme.

quotes: Make the button pink color, dark pink or a good-looking pretty pink, aesthetic pink

acceptanceCriteria: The button background appears as a clearly pink (pretty/dark pink) color in its default state (not coral).
Hover/focus/active states remain within a pink palette (e.g., slightly darker/lighter pink) and maintain sufficient contrast with the button text.
Button styling remains visually consistent with the existing romantic theme and does not introduce a blue/purple-dominant scheme.

requirements.text: Change the user-facing label text on the additional promise reveal button to exactly: "because we love each other. Click me."

quotes: and write because we love each other. Click me.

acceptanceCriteria: The button displays exactly this text (including punctuation and capitalization): "because we love each other. Click me."

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to the revealed promise message text content.
